title: Homeopathy - Self Hypnosis, Guided Imagery, & Meditation
cleaned_text: MD, Co-founder of America's Original Homeopathic College](https://www.drmiller.com/morrison/) Podcast: [Play in new window](http://media.blubrry.com/drmillerpodcasts/p/drmiller.com/wp-content/uploads/healingtimespodcasts/2016/040816MorrisonRePost/WhatisHighQualityHomeopathy_AConversationwithRogerMorrisonMD.mp3) In this conversation with Roger Morrison MD, you will learn about his philosophy and his against the grain life path of letting the world know about the healing wonders of homeopathy.
